name: Mini Equilibrium Rebalancing Cream Cleanser
about: What it is:A travel-friendly creamy cleanser that removes impurities and delivers intensive hydration, visibly transforming dull, stressed skin with youthful-looking radiance..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dryness and Dullness.Formulation:Cream.Highlighted Ingredients:- Cell Balancing Complex: Visibly rebalances, restores, and renews the skin barrier..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, mineral oil, sulfates SLS & SLES, and triclosan. It is also vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Visibly restore your skins natural equilibrium with this highly concentrated and luxuriously lathering pH-balanced cream cleanser (available in full and travel sizes)..PROVEN RESULTSIMMEDIATELY AFTER USE
ingredients: -Cell Balancing Complex: Visibly rebalances, restores, and renews the skin barrier. .-Agastache Mexicana Flower Extract: Preserves moisture and soothes the skin for a youthful, radiant look...Glycerin, Potassium Cocoyl Glycinate, Water/Aqua, Butylene Glycol, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Glyceryl Stearate Se, Glycol Distearate, Citric Acid, Fragrance/Parfum, Propanediol, Phenoxyethanol, Limonene, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose, Linalool, Citronellol, Agastache Mexicana Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Phosphatidylglycerol, Lecithin, BHT.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Dispense a dime-size amount into damp hands. .-Work in a circular motion to create a creamy lather. .-Massage onto wet skin. .-Rinse thoroughly with warm water. .-Use morning and evening.

reviews.review_text: Bought the travel size to test if I liked it. Immediately went and bought the full size. Love how much this lathers and the slight fragrance is nice. Leaves my skin feeling extremely cleansed.
